name: 16-BIT LEGENDS
description:
16-Bit Legends is a free mini game collection based on the music and characters of Riot's League of Legends.

If you -wish- to support it, feel free to donate or become a patreon. (www.patreon.com/imkrut)

16-Bit Legends isn't endorsed by Riot Games and doesn't reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends

(http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber)
